title: Die Hard 6 to be origins story
text:
Die Hard 6 to be origins story Die Hard 6 to be origins story Share 
Die Hard star Bruce Willis could be starring alongside his younger self in the sixth film. 
The next instalment of the action franchise is reported to be an origins story titled Die Hard Year One, which would follow NYPD cop John McClane during his career beginnings in 1979. Bruce Willis plays NYPD cop John McClane in the Die Hard films (Ian West/PA) 
Len Wiseman, who directed the fourth film Die Hard 4.0, is tipped to return for Die Hard 6, alongside producer Lorenzo di Bonaventura, reported Deadline. 
The search for a screenwriter to take on the sixth movie has now begun. 
Bruce, who has portrayed John McClane since the first film in 1988, recently reprised the role in the fifth film, A Good Day To Die Hard, alongside Jai Courtney as his screen son. Share article 
The 60-year-old actor is no stranger to starring with a younger actor playing the same character, as Joseph Gordon-Levitt portrayed his young self in Rian Johnsonâ€™s sci-fi flick Looper. Promoted Stories
